TopicTitle: KSP RP forum server CPU usage exceeded.

Articles.Content:
> 
> Nice, so I was completely removed from the RP it seems according to LW\'s list.

Same here.

I was in charge of Kallifrey, though I\'m not entirely sure if it was accepted or not. I think it was.
Ceylysias, was on the islands north east of Avienne
Dogon it wasn\'t accepted, and sorry JuonKiku, must\'ve missed you by accident!

> 
> Dogon it wasn\'t accepted, and sorry JuonKiku, must\'ve missed you by accident!

Oh. Thanks for clearing that up then.

> 
> Ceylysias, was on the islands north east of Avienne

Ah yes, that\'s on the official map. I must have missed it when conferring with Lord Wasteland over the nations. Worry not, you\'re in.
And thank you for confirming that you did actually miss it ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif).
Well, PM me a map of where it is supposed to be.
Oh good.
Looks like Radion has now cut the band and people are beginning to come in.
Can I get the test again?
So, when will test people get in?
Just sent in an application for membership a few minutes ago, can\'t wait until RP officially begins.

HOORAH! It is open to nation owners! And now, a poem.

*When I woke,*

*RP was broke,*

*It was bad,*

*And very sad.*

*Immediately after,*

*Radion came faster,*

*He set up a forum,*

*To make us less bored!*

*Many days later,*

*It got better,*

*And now we celebrate,*

*Our...* screw it. WAHOO!

Wait, are people going on? Is it open to the public?

(And also, what\'s the address?)

> 
> Wait, are people going on? Is it open to the public?

No, today is focused on testing of stuff; Radion\'s PM\'ed the nation owners with the address.

I\'ve tried to send my confirmation email multiple times, but it hasn\'t sent. Am I missing something obvious, or do I have to be accepted by Radion before it will send? I\'ve double-and-triple-checked the email I set, and it\'s still not working.

There\'s two separate e-mails. The first one is is a \'confirmation\' one, but it\'s just the software confirming that you aren\'t a spambot. The next one is \'membership approved\', which is the real confirmation. It may take a while, as Radion\'s still working on the rules, but you\'re not missing much, don\'t worry.

I need um, some help. I woke up at three.

EDIT: GRRRRRRRRRR. MINCESPY DOES NOT OWN MY NATION. I OWN VOINEIN. GET ME. MY NATION.

> 
> I need um, some help. I woke up at three.
> 
> EDIT: GRRRRRRRRRR. MINCESPY DOES NOT OWN MY NATION. I OWN VOINEIN. GET ME. MY NATION.

The transfer has been made, sorry. Okay, I think we\'re ready to allow everyone else to apply. Remember, no RP\'ing until tomorrow.

roleplaykerb.comlu.com

Still waiting on an acceptance so I can start RPing ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif) Also, the confirmation email still isn\'t sending...? Is it automatic, or does Radion send them?
I need to change my pants. So happy

> 
> Is it automatic, or does Radion send them?

He does, and according to the update thing, he has. Welcome!
While I try to figure out why my computer can\'t access my own site, I have a question for \'yall. Do you have any suggestions for the design of the website. Color palette, backgrounds, etc.

There is not enough color difference between the background and the posts, it blends together too well. The KSP forums have enough difference, but on your forums, it\'s too close, I have problems telling what is what.

Apparently, the buttons for posting pictures, formatting text, etc, all require flash player. This removes all functionality on iOS, which is the only type of OS I have on an unbroken device. I also tried on my friend\'s Android, and it cannot work with formatting with it\'s flash player. Could there be BBC code instead, or at least provide the extensions for formatting (like what are the tags for images you put the URL in between?) It would help anyone wanting to RP via a tablet or smartphone.
